name: Loophole
description:
Loophole is a puzzle game based around using players as platforms.

Only one "player" is controlled at a time, the others are frozen and can be used as platforms to get to the end point.

Currently the game is unfinished, so only the first (only) 8 levels are currently available.

Controls:

a, d - Left, Right

Space - Jump

w - Use

q - Swap

e - Show connections

Development:

Single developer, made as a first project.

Work in progress (WIP) file is included however some levels may be broken due to the nature of the version.
